title: phist@1.9.3 build fails for power9le: -march=native not recognized
body:
`phist@1.9.3` fails to build optimized for `power9le` using `spack@develop` (d978d72e19574dc46dce84704349b716469babe2 from `Fri Apr 2 16:56:16 2021 +0200`)

Concrete spec: [phist.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6250511/phist.spec.yaml.txt)
Full build log: [phist-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6250471/phist-build-out.txt)

```
$> spack install -f ./phist.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing phist-1.9.3-jxrqv52bq6ybd3j7rykmcoh25x4b57vi
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/3a/3ab7157e9f535a4c8537846cb11b516271ef13f82d0f8ebb7f96626fb9ab86cf.tar.gz
######################################################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Applied patch /opt/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/phist/sbang.patch
==> phist: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> phist: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j32'
...
  >> 421    gfortran: error: unrecognized command line option '-march=native'; did you mean '-mcpu=native'?
  >> 422    make[2]: *** [fortran_bindings/CMakeFiles/phist_fort.dir/build.make:760: fortran_bindings/CMakeFiles/phist_fort.dir/phist_types.F90.o] Error 1
     423    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
  >> 424    gfortran: error: unrecognized command line option '-march=native'; did you mean '-mcpu=native'?
  >> 425    make[2]: *** [fortran_bindings/CMakeFiles/phist_fort.dir/build.make:773: fortran_bindings/CMakeFiles/phist_fort.dir/phist_testing.F90.o] Error 1
     426    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-phist-1.9.3-jxrqv52bq6ybd3j7rykmcoh25x4b57vi/spack-build-jxrqv52'
  >> 427    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3182: fortran_bindings/CMakeFiles/phist_fort.dir/all] Error 2
     428    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-phist-1.9.3-jxrqv52bq6ybd3j7rykmcoh25x4b57vi/spack-build-jxrqv52'
     429    make: *** [Makefile:185: all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-phist-1.9.3-jxrqv52bq6ybd3j7rykmcoh25x4b57vi/spack-build-out.txt
```

This was in an `Ubuntu 20.04 w/ GCC 9.3.0` environment, but I observe the same in `RHEL 7.6 w/ GCC 9.3.0`.

@jthies
